Smart Bed: A smart bed equipped with sensors that can monitor your sleep patterns, heart rate, and breathing. It can also adjust your sleep position and temperature to optimize your sleep.
Bed with Built-in Massager: A bed with a built-in massager that can provide a relaxing massage after a long day.
Bed with a Built-in TV: A bed with a built-in TV that can provide entertainment while you relax.
Bed with a Built-in Music Player: A bed with a built-in music player that can provide soothing music to help you relax and fall asleep.
Bed with a Built-in Heating and Cooling System: A bed with a built-in heating and cooling system that can regulate your body temperature to provide a comfortable sleep.
